hedline.hl1: CHINA DEBT CONVERSION SAID TO ADVANCE

abstract.p: China's state-owned asset management institutions, created last year to assume nonperforming loans burdening state banks, have reportedly signed debt-for-equity swap deals with 485 financially distressed enterprises (S)

block.p: China's state-owned asset management institutions, created last year to assume the nonperforming loans burdening state banks, have signed debt-for-equity swap deals with 485 financially distressed enterprises as of July 25, the official news agency Xinhua reported. Under such deals, the asset management firms take the debt that the enterprises owe to state banks and convert it to equity, which the asset management firms hope to sell later.
